Tanks

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a bomb in the game, managing its physics, display, and interactions with the terrain and tanks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb(processing.core.PApplet app, float x, float y, float angle, float powerLevel, int colour, char c)
      Constructs a Bomb object with specified initial settings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructs a Bomb for tank A.
      static Bomb bombB(processing.core.PApplet app, float x, float y, float angle, int power)
      Constructs a Bomb for tank B.
      static Bomb bombC(processing.core.PApplet app, float x, float y, float angle, int power)
      Constructs a Bomb for tank C.
      static Bomb bombD(processing.core.PApplet app, float x, float y, float angle, int power)
      Constructs a Bomb for tank D.
      void destroyTank(java.util.ArrayList<Tank> tanks)
      Handles damage to tanks within the explosion radius and removes destroyed tanks.
      void destroyTerrain()
      Destroys the terrain where the bomb impacts, modifying the terrain heights.
      void displayBomb()
      Displays the bomb on the screen.
      void displayExplosion()
      Displays the explosion effects when the bomb detonates.
      char getFiringTank()
      Returns the identifier of the tank that fired the bomb.
      float getX()
      Gets the current x-coordinate of the bomb.
      float getY()
      Gets the current y-coordinate of the bomb.
      void setX(float X)
      Sets the X co ordinate for the bomb.
      void setY(float Y)
      Sets the Y co ordinate for the bomb.
      void update()
      Updates the position and velocity of the bomb according to physics calculations.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(processing.core.PApplet app,
            float x,
            float y,
            float angle,
            float powerLevel,
            int colour,
            char c)
        Constructs a Bomb object with specified initial settings.
        Parameters:
        app - The main Processing applet instance for drawing and handling game logic.
        x - Initial x-coordinate of the bomb.
        y - Initial y-coordinate of the bomb.
        angle - The firing angle of the bomb.
        powerLevel - The power level affecting the bomb's initial speed.
        colour - The color of the bomb.
        c - The character identifier of the firing tank.

    • Method Detail

        public void setX(float X)
        Sets the X co ordinate for the bomb. (Used for testing purposes only)

        Sets the Y co ordinate for the bomb. (Used for testing purposes only)

        public char getFiringTank()
        Returns the identifier of the tank that fired the bomb.

        The firing tank's identifier.

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the position and velocity of the bomb according to physics calculations.

      • displayBomb

        public void displayBomb()
        Displays the bomb on the screen.

      • displayExplosion

        public void displayExplosion()
        Displays the explosion effects when the bomb detonates.

        x - Initial x-coordinate of the bomb.
        y - Initial y-coordinate of the bomb.
        angle - The firing angle of the bomb.
        power - The power of the bomb being fired.
